column4: Some body help! I installed Ubuntu 11.04 using Wubi, and everything was working fine. Till now, that is. Recently, I have started getting the errors: http://paste.ubuntu.com/623090/ I tried chkdsk /r but it didn't help. Ubuntu is installed in G: drive by the way.
I am badly in need of help.
I have large amounts of data in my Windows installation.
And uh, I can't find the files in G:\ drive also!
Moreover, I cannot find any "found.000" folder.
This isn't Windows help. I installed Ubuntu through Wubi. Now I don't think Windows are going to help me. Some one of you are.
those are windows files on a windows partition
no, they are made by windows
yes, but i don't like it
those files are nothing to do with wubi
/ubuntu/disk/root.disk has nothing to do with Ubuntu?
you are clearly an idiot so I'll give you a link: http://www.pcreview.co.uk/forums/safe-delete-found-000-found-001-found-002-newbie-t1503051.html   IT IS A WINDOWS ISSUE
does that post mention in any way wubi?
